personal.name: Muhammad Hussain
personal.title: React.js Developer
personal.bio: React.js developer focused on building scalable, high-performance web applications and modern user interfaces.
aboutMe: I am a passionate React.js developer currently working on eCommerce and dashboard-based applications. I enjoy building responsive, user-friendly, and scalable web applications using modern frontend technologies.

I have experience working with React, Next.js, state management libraries, and API integrations. I strongly focus on writing clean, maintainable code and continuously improving my frontend development skills.

services.title: Frontend Web Development
services.description: Building scalable and responsive web applications using React.js, Next.js, and modern UI frameworks.

services.title: Dashboard Development
services.description: Developing interactive and data-driven dashboards with optimized performance and user experience.

services.title: UI Implementation
services.description: Transforming design mockups into pixel-perfect, responsive, and accessible user interfaces.

experience.title: React.js Developer
experience.description: Working on eCommerce and dashboard applications using React.js and Next.js. Implemented authentication, protected routing, reusable components, and performance optimizations. Received top score during probation assessment.

experience.title: Frontend Developer Trainee
experience.description: Completed training in modern frontend web development using React.js and full stack fundamentals.
